1.name: Upgrade Knife
1.description: Change out that rusty knife, you might get tetanus...

2.name: Sturdier Skin
2.description: I guess your skin just got sturdier from all that poking!

3.name: Higher Quality Bricks
3.description: Buy higher quality bricks for your altar.

4.name: Blood Thinners
4.description: Those new pills you bought really work a charm huh...

5.name: Polish the altar
5.description: The altar is filled with cracks and grooves, maybe you should polish it...

6.name: Oiled Gears
6.description: Those rusty gears will be highly outclassed by these ones!

7.name: Change your blood
7.description: You heard theres 'Golden' blood in hospitals, no idea how you'll get it into your body but go with it

8.name: Rebuild the automatic machine
8.description: Should it really be making those noises?

9.name: Maybe a little too much
9.description: What if you took multiple of those pills you bought earlier... just maybe...
